name: SainSmart Jr. 1:14 Big
description: It has 4 smooth wheels and could finish 360 degree turning flexibly in both robot model and car shape.There are LED headlights and the robot has an exciting sounds when you speed up, play forward, backward, turn left and turn right. It could transform automatically from car to robot when you hit the button on the remote control. Transforms back and forth easily and quite awesome. Combine car and robot. With an USB charge cable, it could charge easily and everywhere. Full charge for 1h and it will last up for 20-30mins.
featuers: 【One button transforming】 1/14 big transformer automatically from car to robot when you hit the button on the remote control; Transforms back and forth easily and quite awesome
AS SEEN ON SHARK TANK: Project funded by 2 Sharks in Shark Tank Mexico Show
【Realistic engine sound】 there are LED headlights and the robot has an exciting sounds when you speed up, play forward, backward, turn left and turn right
